text:
Hi Paul, here it is the brief of the Show-reel assignment:
-The show-reel should include of 3x vfx project breakdowns (in addition to my major project breakdown), as well as  2 x A1 prints for the end of year exhibition.
- The show-reel should highlight the composites, renders, films concept designs, 3D turntable models and research pieces from the best work during the past 3 years  of University. 
- If there is an interest in a certain area I should demonstrate that through the site.

This is a bit brief about the breakdowns I have to make. 


Many thanks


Alexander
